TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，用于将 对象与其他类型的对象进行转换。

span.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类还具有以进行写入的方法到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)]包和读取从[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)]给定的字符串，表示的包[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的。This class also has methods for writing a to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package and reading a from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package that is given a string that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the . 请参见基类和有关重要用法说明。See the base classes and for important usage notes.
